mapper.select:
select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.metering_id , t1.applicant_id , t1.applicant_depart , t1.device_user_id , t1.device_user_dept , t1.form_state , t1.unified_id , t1.device_name , t1.device_category , t1.device_spec , t1.device_model , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.last_metering_date , t1.meter_person , t1.meter_conclusion , t1.device_metrics , t1.calibration_result , t1.effect_analyse , t1.quality_safe_opinion , t1.chief_opinion , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.proc_id , t1.data_24 , t1.has_effection from assets_trackback t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.METERING_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.meteringId}),'%')
and t1.APPLICANT_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.applicantId}),'%')
and t1.APPLICANT_DEPART like concat(concat('%',#{bean.applicantDepart}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_USER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceUserId}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_USER_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceUserDept}),'%')
and t1.FORM_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.formState}),'%')
and t1.UNIFIED_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unifiedId}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceName}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_CATEGORY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceCategory}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_SPEC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceSpec}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_MODEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceModel}),'%')
and t1.MANUFACTURER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.manufacturerId}),'%')
and t1.LAST_METERING_DATE >= #{bean.lastMeteringDateBegin}
and t1.LAST_METERING_DATE <= #{bean.lastMeteringDateEnd}
and t1.METER_PERSON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.meterPerson}),'%')
and t1.METER_CONCLUSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.meterConclusion}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_METRICS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceMetrics}),'%')
and t1.CALIBRATION_RESULT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.calibrationResult}),'%')
and t1.EFFECT_ANALYSE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.effectAnalyse}),'%')
and t1.QUALITY_SAFE_OPINION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.qualitySafeOpinion}),'%')
and t1.CHIEF_OPINION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.chiefOpinion}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute03}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute04}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute05}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute06}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute07}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute08}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute09}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute10}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute11}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute12}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_16 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute16}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_17 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute17}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_18 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute18}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_19 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute19}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
and t1.PROC_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.procId}),'%')
and t1.DATA_24 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.data24}),'%')
and t1.HAS_EFFECTION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.hasEffection}),'%')
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.metering_id , t1.applicant_id , t1.applicant_depart , t1.device_user_id , t1.device_user_dept , t1.form_state , t1.unified_id , t1.device_name , t1.device_category , t1.device_spec , t1.device_model , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.last_metering_date , t1.meter_person , t1.meter_conclusion , t1.device_metrics , t1.calibration_result , t1.effect_analyse , t1.quality_safe_opinion , t1.chief_opinion , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.proc_id , t1.data_24 , t1.has_effection from assets_trackback t1 where t1.id = #{id}
